goodResponse.question: Why did Jesus weep?
goodResponse.answer: ✦ Jesus wept in John 11:35 because He felt genuine compassion for Mary and others mourning Lazarus' death. Even knowing He would raise Lazarus, Jesus showed His full humanity and empathy. His tears remind us that God understands our grief. How does knowing Jesus feels your pain comfort you?
